FuncDef:
The tos-exp command sets a priority of BFD control packets for a single static BFD session.
The undo tos-exp command restores the default setting. The tos-exp command sets a priority of BFD control packets for a single static BFD session. The undo tos-exp command restores the default setting. By default, the priority is 7, which is the highest priority of BFD control packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a priority for BFD control packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 7.

ExtraInfo: When the system is congested, BFD control packets with a higher priority are preferentially sent. To change a priority of BFD control packets for a single static BFD session, run the tos-exp command.
